refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns or sets the color of active links in the document body.

funcsynopsis.paramdef: color is a string containing the name of the color (e.g., "blue", "darkblue", etc., or the octal value of the color (e.g., FFFFF )

refsect1.title: Specification
refsect1.para: DOM Level 0. Not part of specification.
